    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_81182</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_81182</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Rainbow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regenbogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arc-en-ciel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arco-íris</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rainbow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουράνιο τόξο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arco iris</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows what happens when light hits a raindrop. This results to the formation of a rainbow.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rainbow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">raindrop</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, was geschieht, wenn Licht 
einen Regentropfen schlägt. Dieses resultiert zur Anordnung 
eines Regenbogens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre ce qui se produit quand
la lumière frappe une goutte de pluie. Ceci résulte à la 
formation d'un arc-en-ciel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o que acontece quando a 
luz bate um pingo de chuva. Isto resulta à formação de um 
arco-íris.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che cosa accade quando
la luce colpisce un raindrop. Ciò risulta alla formazione di un
Rainbow.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τι συμβαίνει πότε το φως 
χτυπά μια σταγόνα βροχής. Αυτό οδηγεί στο σχηματισμό ενός
ουράνιου τόξου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra qué sucede cuando la 
luz golpea una gota de agua. Esto resulta a la formación de un 
arco iris.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regenbogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regentropfen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arc-en-ciel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">goutte de pluie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arco-íris</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pingo de chuva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rainbow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raindrop</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
